name: Tiny Planet (Northmoore)
description:
DEFEND

Protect your planet from a hail of devastating meteors approaching your planet
from every direction. Keep your eyes out for special meteors with unique properties!

GROW
Watch your planet grow from the size of the Moon to the overwhelming size of a sun!

CUSTOMISE
Create your own planet and choose your favourite combination of colours to really make your planet unique
to you. Change the grass, water and foliage of your planet!

HIGHSCORE
Track your high-scores and create a galaxy of your own creation!

Your planet awaits you, what are you waiting for? Try Tiny Planet for free today!

Northmoore Games
Indie development team
Follow us @ https://twitter.com/NorthmooreG
